p: Ipilimumab is a fully human monoclonal immunoglobulin (Ig) G1k specific for human CTLA-4 manufactured by Bristol Myers Squibb (BMS). Nivolumab is a human monoclonal antibody (HuMAb; immunoglobulin G4 [IgG4]-S228P) manufactured by BMS that inhibits the PD-1 receptor on cell surface. The clinical safety profile of nivolumab and ipilimumab as a combination therapy has emerged from a number of clinical studies in a number of tumour types [ 17â€“ 22].
